title: My Credentials
no_credentials_desc: Receive your first credential to get started
create_wallet_desc: We'll generate a secure identity on your device. No crypto jargon, just a secure account.
add_credentials_desc: Import from file, paste token, scan QR, or use DigiLocker (beta).
share_safely_desc: Create a time-limited QR to share only what's needed.
backup_keys_desc: Export an encrypted backup so you never lose access.
